name: Late Cram Nights
description:
Late Cram Nights was inspired by my journey as a developer to learn new concepts. The creatures that haunt you in this game represent the things that were holding me back from pursuing my dream to become a developer.

This game was made during Book Jam, a jam where your game entry is put into a book, which then the book is sold for charity. As of right now the game is unfinished, as I had things pop up during the development.
